an5.64:4.1: “Mendicants, a female noble disciple who grows in five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.
an5.64:4.3: She grows in faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
an5.64:4.4: A female noble disciple who grows in these five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.”
an5.64:5.1: “She who grows in faith and ethics,
an5.64:5.2: wisdom, and both generosity and learning—
an5.64:5.3: a virtuous laywoman such as she
an5.64:5.4: takes on what is essential for herself in this life.”
